description:
Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than of that of a shinobi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lass das Ninja-Leben hinter dir – Tsunades Ankündigung
Ninja o Yamero! Tsunade no Tsuukoku
ซึนาเดะประกาศลั่น เลิกเป็นนินจาซะ
忍者を辞めろ! ツナデの通告
